content: I couldn't find it mentioned in the docs anywhere, but is something like @admins supported implicitly to reach the admins? Basically I'm trying to figure out the best way to document how to reach the admins for any Code of Conduct issues for our org so that the admins are made aware and can have a conversation with the reporter but to have that conversation not be public.

@Brett Cannon good question! I think now that we have the Zulip "user groups" feature, it'd be pretty easy to have an automatically generate user group that has the organization administrators in it. For now, you can just add it manually using our "user groups" feature in "Organization settings".
